# Draft:Battle of Herat (1719)

The Battle of Herat was fought between the Persians and Afghans. Encouraged by the success of Khilji Afghans revolt against Safavid, the Abdali Afghans of Herat captured Herat from Safavids under the leadership of Asadullah Khan. In 1719, a 30,000 men Persian army lead by the Safi Kuli Khan tried to recapture Herat. Asadullah opposed the Persians with the 15000 Abdali afghans and defeated them in the battle of herat 1719.
